original_text: Jesus withdrew with his disciples to the lake, and a large crowd from Galilee followed.
korean_text: 예수께서 제자들과 함께 바다로 물러가시니 갈릴리에서 큰 무리가 따르며

sentences.original_text: Jesus withdrew with his disciples to the lake
and a large crowd from Galilee followed
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 갈릴리에서 온 큰 무리가 따랐다
